products.name: SmartDiffers X6 (6 in 1 ) 6 TOP TIER Differs strategies in 1 Bot
products.desc:
🚀 Dominate the Deriv market with SmartDiffers X6 – a supercharged bot with 6 intelligent entry strategies and 3 dynamic stake recovery systems to fit every trader’s style.

✅ Features:





🎯 6 Powerful Differ Strategies (AI-assisted entry logic)



🔁 3 Recovery Systems: Normal Martingale, Reverse Martingale, Split Martingale



🧠 Smart Selection: Let the bot choose strategies randomly or follow your custom sequence (1-6)



📊 Staking Freedom: Use manual stake or let the bot auto-calculate based on your balance (e.g., 10%)



⚙️ Easy Settings: Choose 1 strategy or combine them all – your choice, your game!

🎁 What You Get:





📂 The full SmartDiffers X6 bot (.xml)



📄 Detailed PDF documentation (setup, strategies & tips)



📈 Risk Management Calculator (Excel)



📹 Video tutorial (link provided)

💵 Launch Offer: Only $10 for the first 10 buyers! Price increases afterward – grab your copy now.

🎓 No experience? No problem. This bot is beginner friendly, yet packed with features pros love.

🎯 Start making smarter trades on Deriv today!
